articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
Re The proposal updates the DDIP process in the following ways:
- Reduces DDIP stages
- Reduces allowlist threshold from 50k > 25k
- Clarifies how members join allow list
- Clarifies certain edge cases
cont.

articles.description:
RT Paloma | web3paloma.lens
Look at me 🥺
She Code Africa: The first lightning talk was taken by Paloma Peter-Dzoho on “ How to gain the most from communities as a contributor” 
Paloma shared her journey with us and how actively contributing in communities took her career to the next level.
 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zzhAfFmtYSs&list=PLe_ivkWIZCj9DeD3XGc61eFtuDISVq6QP&index=9
